definition[0]: to state something in an exact and detailed way
example[0]: Payments will be made for a specified number of months.
example[1]: Regulations specify how long maintenance crews can work.
example[2]: The rules clearly specify that competitors must not accept payment.
example[3]: It is useful to specify the due date for payment.
example[4]: The work must be completed within the specified period agreed in the contract.
example[5]: The manufacturer specifies that the cement must be left for 72 hours.
